accessToken.description:
Embedded video access token.
Should be provided if you want to extract data from private video in VI

accountId.description:
Video indexer account Id.
Should be provided if you want to extract data from VI

components.description: Allows you to control the insights that you want to render.

controls.description: Allows you to control the controls that you want to render.

customData.description: Custom insights data. Provide your own insights - support both capsules and color map.

presets.description: Define which presets controls this insights

location.description:
Location indicates account's location.
Should be provided if you want to extract data from VI

preset.description: Controls the preset that is selected.

rawInsightsData.description: Video indexer insights raw data. Use VI insights component with your own data

language.description: The mode that specifies the language of the widget
The mode that specifies the language of the widget
The mode that specifies the language of the widget
The mode that specifies the language of the widget
The mode that specifies the language of the widget

theme.description: Controls widget theme by Video Indexer

tab.description: Controls the Insights tab that's rendered by default.

viInsightsKeys.description: Video indexer insights component key list, each insight from this list will be taken from VI.

videoId.description:
Embedded video ID
Should be provided if you want to extract data from VI
